query: Build an n8n node that connects to a custom internal API. The node needs to fetch records, transform the response by flattening nested objects, and support pagination. It should also handle errors gracefully. Use the programmatic style.
expected_behavior: Creates a programmatic node with an async execute() method
Imports IExecuteFunctions from n8n-core and relevant types from n8n-workflow
Implements item-by-item processing loop over this.getInputData()
Uses this.getNodeParameter() to read user-configured values
Uses this.getCredentials() to retrieve API credentials
Includes continueOnFail() error handling pattern with try/catch per item
Uses constructExecutionMetaData with itemData for proper item linking
Creates a GenericFunctions.ts with apiRequest and apiRequestAllItems helpers
Implements pagination in apiRequestAllItems (offset or cursor-based)
Includes returnAll/limit parameter pair for getAll operations
Follows standard resource/operation pattern with displayOptions
baseline_without_skill: Agent may forget continueOnFail pattern, skip constructExecutionMetaData, implement pagination incorrectly, miss GenericFunctions helper pattern, or produce incorrect item linking.
with_skill_expected: Agent produces a complete programmatic node with proper error handling, pagination, item linking, and GenericFunctions helpers following established n8n patterns.
